snippet: Gov. Jerry Brown signed legislation allowing immigrants to apply for state-financed scholarships and aid at state universities.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Jerry Brown signed legislation allowing immigrants to apply for state-financed scholarships and aid at state universities.

headline.main: Dream Act Becomes Law in California
headline.print_headline: Dream Act Becomes Law In California
headline.seo: California Measure Allows Tuition Aid for Illegal Immigrants
